# keepNetworkOutput

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates the raw pixel buffer continues to emit from the network.

## Declaration

```swift
var keepNetworkOutput: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]; otherwise, the request ignores [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNTrackOpticalFlowRequest/outputPixelFormat].

## Configuring the Request

- **computationAccuracy**: The level of accuracy to compute the optical flow.
- **VNTrackOpticalFlowRequest.ComputationAccuracy**: Computational accuracy options.
- **outputPixelFormat**: The pixel format type of the output value.
